S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-2052: JDBC.assertRowInResultSet compares the wrong value if using trimmed strings and a SMALLINT column exists.
Patch that 1) moves the locally scoped variables in JDBC.assertRowInResultSet() into the for loop, and 2) sets the "obj" variable through all paths.
Contributed by Dan Debrunner (djd@apache.org)
